mdata:patch.description: patches source metadata files in order to solve common Salesforce deployment bugs or to modifly on the fly API endpoints

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

env.name: env
env.description: Environment name used to select the correct patch set from sfdx-project.json

rootdir.name: rootdir
rootdir.description: the input directory that contains the source files to be patched

inmanifestdir.name: inmanifestdir
inmanifestdir.description: the input manifest (package.xml) file describing the contents of the source files
